title: 4th iteration of this role

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: At night, choose 3 players in a specific order. You gain the role and wincons of the first person, and the chain continues, with the last person gaining your role and wincons.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: Players who were previously Post 4637 cannot be turned back into Post 4637, so if selected as the last in the order, the order will be randomized in such a way that a player that was not previously Post 4637 will be last. If no such order exists for the set of players selected, the action will fail.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Turn someone else into Post 4637 and steal a role and win with your new faction.

desc:
Post 4637
*this is like the 4th iteration of this role*
*you're telling me there are 4 other tim henson roles?*
*no there are 4 other "swap your role with someone else" roles*
